content: the hudson beanie is a lightweight crochet hat made with lion brand mandala yarn and a 5 mm hook it features double_crochet and crossed double_crochet stitches for an easy textured look the **hudson beanie** is a fun and cozy crochet project that s great for the whole family the pattern includes clear instructions and multiple sizes so you can make a hat for anyone it s worked with **lion brand mandala yarn** and a **5 mm hook** and the easy stitches create a soft textured look the color changes in the yarn make each beanie unique and it s a quick project you ll enjoy adding to your collection **unique features-** versatile sizing options for all ages easy-level pattern suitable for beginners beautiful color transitions with mandala dk yarn quick and fun project to add to your collection **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn mandala dk weight 120-126 yards gauge 14 stitches by 8 row = 4 inches in double_crochet / pattern stitch **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **join the cal newsletter here ** https
